topic: Announcing the DIVA Day Student Competition!
body:
Hi Everyone,


For DIVA Day this year, we are hosting a student competition! Please pass
along if you know any students who might be interested!  Announcement below
and more info at: http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2014/student-comp


Thanks!
Kera




<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2014/student-comp?xg_source=msg_mes_network>


 *Announcing the 1st DIVA Day Student Competition!
<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2014/student-comp?xg_source=msg_mes_network>*


*Deadline September 6th, 2014!*


*One $750 Award! *


*
<http://api.ning.com/files/Iumatxx-0jwrpnV5kTA-S4t-p*D1j4gEQZgzoCtPMd*r9COEv01-O7NvLIpiyRHm0oJg3BqcbeBCK27gQ2N3T8XCDKG2YAsl/DIVADayBanner20141student.jpg>*


Students, we want to see how you are using DIVA!


The selected individual or group will receive a $750 stipend to cover
travel costs to DIVA Day, free conference registration, and will have their
poster displayed during DIVA Day 2014 in Seattle, WA!




<http://api.ning.com/files/Iumatxx-0jwrpnV5kTA-S4t-p*D1j4gEQZgzoCtPMd*r9COEv01-O7NvLIpiyRHm0oJg3BqcbeBCK27gQ2N3T8XCDKG2YAsl/DIVADayBanner20141student.jpg>


*Eligibility*


Undergraduate and graduate students


*Schedule*


Submissions due:  September 6, 2014 @ 12:00am PDT (3:00am EDT)


Submit via email to: kera at solemma.net


*Submission Requirements*


   1. Application - one form per project. For group projects, list all
   applicants and full contact information on an additional sheet and
   submit it with the application
   Click here for the application form.
   <http://api.ning.com/files/Iumatxx-0jyE5SGuNk8tbm8ci4rSOz2FZDTJYs7a5uD2avJapgbGyaJse3VaL9zEFkdUfnQA4lcYHN2gZmzl4-nWfMZf278D/DIVADay2014StudentCompetitionApplication.pdf>
    2. (1) ARCH D (24” x 36”) poster (portrait or landscape) including
   images and text describing your project. File size limit: 5MB.




*Award*


1 award of  $750 +


free registration to DIVA Day 2014 in Seattle, WA


In the case of group projects, all applicants will receive free
registration to DIVA Day, and the stipend will be divided equally among all
team members.




We are looking for projects that clearly show how DIVA is  or was used to
impact design decisions. Submissions will also be judged on innovative or
creative use of the software, sophistication of simulations, and overall
narrative and graphical presentation.




For more information please contact:


DIVA Day Student Competition
<http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day-2014/student-comp?xg_source=msg_mes_network>


or


Kera Lagios


kera at solemma.net


www.diva4rhino.com


Visit DIVA for Rhino at: http://diva4rhino.com/?xg_source=msg_mes_network




 To control which emails you receive on DIVA for Rhino, click here
<http://diva4rhino.com/?xgo=gLx-VuoBqJxbUuGv7i6mlmUieB7K7Olw57pIVZTBfPZ5UMzMI9-Z7A&xg_source=msg_mes_network>
